p: More than eight thousand phenolic compounds are known to exist in nature. These compounds chemically contain at least one aromatic ring with one or more attached hydroxyl (OH âˆ’) groups as well as other substituents. Phenolic derivatives are the largest group of secondary plant metabolites synthesized by higher plants and are believed to be essential for plant survival by providing defense against microbial attack and by making the plant unpalatable to herbivores ( Apak et al., 2007; Tungmunnithum et al., 2018)
